scripts.cucumber: NODE_ENV=production IS_TEST_ENV=true IS_RN_ENV=false cucumber-js --tags "not @skip" --format summary --require features/hooks.js  --require node_modules/mfg-base/features/step_definitions/baseSteps.js --require features/step_definitions/analyticsScreenSteps.js
scripts.cucumber-ui: NODE_ENV=production IS_TEST_ENV=true IS_RN_ENV=false UI=true cucumber-js -t "not @skip" --format summary
